name: harmoniously
content:
harmoniously adverb
(pleasantly)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a friendly and peaceful way: We worked together very harmoniously. In Ethiopia, Muslims and Christians live harmoniously together.
in a way in which things look, taste, or work well together: All the flavours blend harmoniously in this wonderful dish. The church harmoniously combines Romanesque towers and nave with Gothic steeples, choir, and chancel.
More examplesFewer examplesDemocrats don't always coexist harmoniously.It is an example of how power companies can work harmoniously with the environment. This cream works harmoniously with the skin.There are few pleasures as sweet as that derived from a harmoniously created garden.

(music)
in a way that has a pleasant tune or harmony: Young and old sang harmoniously together. He has a voice that blends harmoniously with pop instrumentation.
